ATI FOCUS

  * [Instructional Materials](https://www.fullerton.edu/ATI/instructional)
  * [Procurement](https://www.fullerton.edu/ATI/procurement)
  * [Web](https://www.fullerton.edu/ATI/website)

ATI Reports

  * [Campus Web](https://titans.service-now.com/ati/ "csuf login required")

# Accessible Technology Initiative (ATI)

The [CSU Accessible Technology Initiative](https://ati.calstate.edu/) (ATI) is the effort by the California State University (CSU) system to ensure that information and communication technology (ICT) is accessible to all students, faculty, staff, and the wider community. ICT includes websites, computer software and hardware, and multimedia such as video.

The ATI focuses on three areas:

  * **Instructional materials** : documents, multimedia, C...
